ygData.subject: Re: A time, 20 million years ago
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron s turret turned and fired a ray of fusion at the Prime, but all he did was leap up into the air, and avoid the crushing power. Gauntlet activated his

Subject: Re: A time, 20 million years ago
References: <9f1cqq+f14s@...> <00e901c0e91a$b538e480$10929cd1@pavilion> <3B15A448.52C1@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron's turret turned and fired a ray of fusion at the Prime, but all
he did was leap up into the air, and avoid the crushing power. Gauntlet
activated his jet pack, and sent himself flying towards Megatron, claw
stretched out. The two made impact, Gauntlet Prime flying over the body,
gashing it deeply, and turning it up on itself. He landed a few feet
back, and Megatron on the top of his tank, upside down. He let out a cry
of rage, as he transformed, but was to late, Gauntlet Prime had lunged
forward and gouged Megatron in the side, sending him toppling over onto
his side, exposed circuitry fissling. "And now, Peace." He said charging
up his glove, and moving in. He leapt at Megatron, but the Slagmaker
quickly put his feet, and they caught Gauntlet Prime in the chest.
Gauntlet Prime stayed on the feet, motionless from having the his
circuits jarred, as Megatron coiled his legs inward, then put his arms
on the ground for leverage. With a grunt he sent the Prime flying back,
into a charred building, the floor he hit collapsing a bit under the
impact, as Megatron landed gracefully on his feet. As Gauntlet Prime dug
himself out, he noticed the barrel of Megatron's cannon aimed at him,
and tried to move, but his leg was stuck. Megatron allowed himself a
second to smile, then let his power erupt, heading straight into the
current Prime. A scream covered the landscape, and then smoke started to
rise up from the building. Megatron turned his attention towards the
trailor, as an ancient robot moved towards the late Gauntlet Prime.
